column2: Fire Officer        (      Job Number:          HOT0AK6I    )          Work Locations      :          DoubleTree by Hilton Gurugram Baani Square            Sector 50        Baani Square            Gurugram        122002                    A Security Supervisor keeps constant vigilance of activity on and around the hotel property and reports,  with documentation,  incidents with the intent of improving the safety and security of Guests,  Team Members,  and others.          What will I be doing?        As a Security Supervisor,  you are responsible for the safety and security of all Guests,  Team Members and contractors,  and visitors while at the hotel.  A Security Supervisor is also responsible for the safety and security of the hotel premises and the oversight of the Security Team.  Specifically,  the Security Supervisor will perform the following tasks at the highest level of service:      Constant vigilance of hotel operations and premises    Maintain all documents and key systems to legal and Company requirements    Recommend improvements in surveillance,  security,  and fire systems    Review,  quickly and thoroughly,  any incidents with the intention of preventing re-occurrences    Train and supervise the Security Team,  organize work schedules,  and ensure all policies are followed    Conduct regular briefings with the Security Team                        What are we looking for?          A Fire Officer serving Hilton brands is always working on behalf of our Guests and working with other Team Members.  To successfully fill this role,  you should maintain the attitude,  behaviours,  skills,  and values that follow:      Previous fire officer experience,  preferably working within an industry which monitored large volumes of people movement    Experience in planning,  organizing,  and enforcing security systems    Current and working knowledge (proof of valid qualifications required) of fire,  safety,  and first aid    Excellent inter-personal and communication skills    Excellent personal presentation      It would be advantageous in this position for you to demonstrate the following capabilities and distinctions:      Previous training experience with relevant qualifications            What will it be like to work for Hilton?          Hilton is the leading global hospitality company,  spanning the lodging sector from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels.  For nearly a century,  Hilton has offered business and leisure travelers the finest in accommodations,  service,  amenities and value.  Hilton is dedicated to continuing its tradition of providing exceptional guest experiences across its  global brands .   Our vision  to fill the earth with the light and warmth of hospitality  unites us as a team to create remarkable hospitality experiences around the world every day.   And,  our amazing Team Members are at the heart of it all!                                Job      :        Security and Loss Prevention          Schedule      :        Full-time

column2: The Security Officer plays a vital role in ensuring the safety and security of our      software engineering     campus in Noida. We are nearing completion of our five-acre software engineering campus in Sector 145 next to Metro Station.                 You will      be responsible for     implementing and enforcing security protocols,      maintaining     a safe work environment, and responding to security incidents. You will      be responsible for     managing security guards and other operations personnel.                             Key Responsibilities:                             Conduct regular patrols of the campus grounds, buildings, and      common areas     including server rooms, and office areas, to deter criminal activity and ensure the safety of staff, students, and visitors.             Monitor and respond to alarms and security camera footage to      identify     and address any suspicious activities within the building and surrounding areas.             Enforce security policies and procedures, including access control measures for IT facilities and equipment.             Collaborate with campus security personnel to      maintain     a cohesive security presence across the entire campus.             Conduct background checks and issue security clearances for authorized personnel with access to IT resources.             Escort visitors within IT facilities and ensure proper identification and authorization for building access.             Respond to emergencies, such as fires, medical situations, and security breaches, and take      appropriate action     to mitigate risks and coordinate with campus emergency responders.             Prepare and      maintain     detailed reports on security incidents and activities specific to the     campus/building.             Stay      up to date     on the latest security trends and best practices relevant to both physical and IT security.             Collaborate with local law enforcement, emergency services, and building management to coordinate security efforts and response activities.             Foster a positive and professional relationship with the campus community, promoting security awareness and best practices.                           Qualifications & Skills             :                             Minimum 12-15 years of experience in security operations, preferably within an IT environment or a campus setting.             Minimum graduation from a recognized school and equivalent experience in security.             Proven experience in implementing and enforcing security policies and procedures.             Strong understanding of security principles, best practices, and relevant IT security protocols.             Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to de-escalate potentially volatile situations and build rapport with a diverse campus community.             Fluent      in     both      English     and Hindi     language     s     .             Proficient in using security equipment and technology, including access control systems, CCTV, and basic IT troubleshooting tools.             Ability to work independently and as part of a team, collaborating effectively with campus security and IT personnel.             Excellent observation and attention to detail.
